nodes.name: GuestPost Inquiry

parameters.html:
=

Hello,

Thank you for reaching out! We’re thrilled to help you gain exposure through guest posting on our diverse platforms. Here’s everything you need to know to get started:

Pricing & Options:

  • Guest Post: $0 per post. Bulk discounts are available for multiple submissions.
  • Link Insertion: $0 per link in an existing post.

Both options come with do-follow backlinks, ensuring long-term SEO benefits for your website.

Why Partner with Us?

  • Reach: Gain exposure to niche-specific, engaged audiences.
  • Quick Turnaround: Publication within 3 business days for a seamless experience.
  • Diverse Niches: Choose from a variety of topics to suit your content needs.

Choose the Right Platform:

Our websites span various niches, so you can select the one that best matches your content. Explore them here:

  • syncbricks.com
  • s4stechnology.com
  • shukranoman.com
  • brenttechnologies.com
  • mairimanzil.com
  • techfeed.com.au
  • tuts.plus
  • swifttapper.com
  • amjidali.com
  • hamid.com.au
  • cio.guru

Submission Guidelines:

  • Original Content: Submissions must be high-quality, unpublished, and niche-relevant.
  • Minimum Word Count: 300 words.
  • Formatting: Use headings, subheadings, and bullet points for readability.
  • Backlinks: One do-follow backlink is permitted per post.
  • Images: Unique and relevant images are encouraged.

How to Submit:

Reply to this email with your completed guest post and any supporting materials. We’ll review your submission and get back to you within 3 business days.

Payment Information:

Once your guest post or link insertion request is approved, we’ll provide you with payment details. We accept payments through:

  • PayPal
  • Bank Transfer
  • Other methods (upon request)

Please let us know your preferred method, and we’ll share the necessary information.

Questions?

If you need further assistance or guidance, feel free to reach out. We’re here to help!

Best regards,
Sophia Mitchell
Outreach Manager | syncbricks.com
WhatsApp: +1

© 2025 SyncBricks. All rights reserved.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Gmailtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Gmailtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 9 different services: textClassifier, stickyNote, gmailTrigger, lmChatGoogleGemini, stopAndError. It contains 20 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 20
- **Node Types**: 9
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Gmail Trigger**: gmailTrigger
- **Text Classifier**: textClassifier
- **Google Gemini Chat Model**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **GuestPost Inquiry**: emailSend
- **Youtube Video Inquiry**: emailSend
- **Send Email**: emailSend
- **Mark as Read**: gmail
- **Apply Label**: gmail
- **Create Contact in Brevo**: sendInBlue
- **Emails from Existing Contracts**: if
- ... and 10 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
